name: High Stakes
description:
High Stakes is a short prototype by Happy Havok.

It being a prototype, there's only 2 levels.

Any and all feedback is appreciated, and be sure to let me know if this is something you'd want to see made into a very short, but complete, game.

Controls are WASD and Mouse.

All content created by Patrick Lerum (Happy Havok).

Made in GameMaker Studio 2.

Prototype made for All Things Wicked Game Jam - Act 01:

https://itch.io/jam/allthingswicked
